# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/okhttp\.html$
ignore$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.pdf$
\.png$
^test/fixtures/samples/0/Foo\.md$
^test/fixtures/samples/3/Foo\.md$
^\.github/
